allow: Bash(cmd /c "where go 2>nul || echo Go not found")
Bash(cmd /c "dir ""C:\\Program Files\\Go"" 2>nul && echo FOUND || echo NOT FOUND")
Bash(cmd /c "dir ""C:\\Go"" 2>nul && echo FOUND || echo NOT FOUND")
Bash(cmd /c "go env CGO_ENABLED GOOS GOARCH CC")
Bash(cmd /c "go env CGO_ENABLED && go env GOOS && go env GOARCH && go env CC && go version")
Bash(cmd /c "if not exist D:\\Projects\\FD\\bin mkdir D:\\Projects\\FD\\bin")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -File - <<'PS1'
$tmp = [System.IO.Path]::GetTempPath\(\)
$zip = Join-Path $tmp "ort123.zip"
$dir = Join-Path $tmp "ort123"
Write-Host "Downloading ORT 1.23.1..."
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri "https://github.com/microsoft/onnxruntime/releases/download/v1.23.1/onnxruntime-win-x64-1.23.1.zip" -OutFile $zip
Write-Host "Extracting..."
Expand-Archive -Path $zip -DestinationPath $dir -Force
Write-Host "Copying DLL..."
Copy-Item \(Join-Path $dir "onnxruntime-win-x64-1.23.1\\lib\\onnxruntime.dll"\) "D:\\Projects\\FD\\bin\\onnxruntime.dll" -Force
Write-Host "DONE"
PS1)
Bash(cmd /c "del /Q D:\\Projects\\FD\\api.exe D:\\Projects\\FD\\ingestor.exe D:\\Projects\\FD\\worker.exe 2>nul && echo DELETED || echo NOTHING TO DELETE")
